verses.verse: Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G67>Agrippa<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G4671>Thou<s%> art <S%G2010>permitted<s%> to <S%G3004>speak<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G4572>thyself.<s%> <S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> stretched <S%G1614>forth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and answered for himself: <S%G626><s%>

I <S%G2233>think<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> <S%G3107>happy,<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa,<s%> because I <S%G3195>shall<s%> answer for <S%G626>myself<s%> this <S%G4594>day<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%> <S%G4012>touching<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the things <S%G3739>whereof<s%> I am <S%G1458>accused<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> the Jews: <S%G2453><s%>

Especially <S%G3122><s%> because I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> to <S%G5607>be<s%> <S%G1109>expert<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1485>customs<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2213>questions<s%> which are <S%G2596>among<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews:<s%> <S%G1352>wherefore<s%> I <S%G1189>beseech<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%> <S%G3116>patiently.<s%>

My <S%G3450><s%> manner of <S%G981>life<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> my <S%G3503>youth,<s%> which <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G575>at<s%> the <S%G746>first<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> mine <S%G3450>own<s%> <S%G1484>nation<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2467>know<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews;<s%>

Which <S%G4267>knew<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> from the <S%G509>beginning,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> they <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3140>testify,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> most <S%G196>straitest<s%> <S%G139>sect<s%> of <S%G2251>our<s%> <S%G2356>religion<s%> I <S%G2198>lived<s%> a <S%G5330>Pharisee.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> I <S%G2476>stand<s%> and am <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> our fathers: <S%G3962><s%>

Unto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> promise <S%G2257>our<s%> twelve <S%G1429>tribes,<s%> <S%G1722>instantly<s%> <S%G1616><s%> <S%G3000>serving<s%> God <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3571>night,<s%> <S%G1679>hope<s%> to <S%G2658>come.<s%> <S%G4012>For<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1680>hope's<s%> sake, <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa,<s%> I am <S%G1458>accused<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews.<s%>

Why <S%G5101><s%> should it be <S%G2919>thought<s%> a thing <S%G571>incredible<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G1487>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> should <S%G1453>raise<s%> the <S%G3498>dead?<s%>

I <S%G1473><s%> <S%G3303>verily<s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G1380>thought<s%> with <S%G1683>myself,<s%> that I <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G4238>do<s%> many <S%G4183>things<s%> <S%G1727>contrary<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3480>Nazareth.<s%>

Which <S%G3739>thing<s%> I <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>saints<s%> did <S%G1473>I<s%> shut <S%G2623>up<s%> in <S%G5438>prison,<s%> having <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G749>priests;<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> when <S%G846>they<s%> were put to <S%G337>death,<s%> I gave my voice <S%G2702>against<s%> <S%G5586><s%> them.

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G5097>punished<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4178>oft<s%> in <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> and <S%G315>compelled<s%> them to <S%G987>blaspheme;<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> being exceedingly mad <S%G1693>against<s%> <S%G4057><s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> I <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> them <S%G2193>even<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1854>strange<s%> <S%G4172>cities.<s%>

Whereupon <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2532>as<s%> I <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1154>Damascus<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2011>commission<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G749>priests,<s%>

At <S%G3319>midday,<s%> <S%G2250><s%> O <S%G935>king,<s%> <S%G1492>I<s%> saw <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%> a <S%G5457>light<s%> from <S%G3771>heaven,<s%> <S%G5228>above<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2987>brightness<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2246>sun,<s%> shining round <S%G4034>about<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> them which <S%G4198>journeyed<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G1698>me.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G2257>we<s%> were <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2667>fallen<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth,<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1446>Hebrew<s%> <S%G1258>tongue,<s%> Saul, <S%G4549><s%> <S%G4549>Saul,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G1377>persecutest<s%> thou <S%G3165>me?<s%> it is <S%G4642>hard<s%> for <S%G4671>thee<s%> to <S%G2979>kick<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> the pricks. <S%G2759><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G450>rise,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> feet: <S%G4228><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I have <S%G3700>appeared<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> purpose, to <S%G4400>make<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> a <S%G5257>minister<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3144>witness<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> of these things <S%G3739>which<s%> thou hast <S%G1492>seen,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> of those things in the <S%G3739>which<s%> I will <S%G3700>appear<s%> unto thee; <S%G4671><s%>

Delivering <S%G1807><s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> from <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> I <S%G649>send<s%> thee, <S%G4571><s%>

To <S%G455>open<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> and to <S%G1994>turn<s%> them <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5457>light,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> from <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> of <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> may <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of <S%G266>sins,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2819>inheritance<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3588>them<s%> which are <S%G37>sanctified<s%> by <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> is <S%G1519>in<s%> me. <S%G1691><s%>
Whereupon, <S%G3606><s%> O <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa,<s%> I <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G545>disobedient<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3770>heavenly<s%> vision: <S%G3701><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G518>showed<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> unto <S%G3588>them<s%> <S%G1722>of<s%> <S%G1154>Damascus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> at <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G1519>throughout<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5561>coasts<s%> of <S%G2449>Judea,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> then to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> that they should <S%G3340>repent<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1994>turn<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G4238>do<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G514>meet<s%> for <S%G3341>repentance.<s%>

For these <S%G1752>causes<s%> <S%G5130><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4815>caught<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2411>temple,<s%> and went <S%G3987>about<s%> to <S%G1315>kill<s%> me.

Having <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5177>obtained<s%> <S%G1947>help<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> I <S%G2476>continue<s%> <S%G891>unto<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G3140>witnessing<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> to <S%G3398>small<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3173>great,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> other <S%G1622>things<s%> than those <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5037><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> did <S%G2980>say<s%> <S%G3195>should<s%> come: <S%G1096><s%>

That <S%G1487><s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> should <S%G3805>suffer,<s%> and <S%G1487>that<s%> he should be the <S%G4413>first<s%> that should <S%G1537>rise<s%> <S%G386><s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G2605>show<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G5023>thus<s%> spake for <S%G626>himself,<s%> <S%G5347>Festus<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> thou art beside <S%G3105>thyself;<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G1121>learning<s%> doth <S%G4062>make<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G3130>mad.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G5346>said,<s%> I am not <S%G3105>mad,<s%> <S%G3756><s%> most <S%G2903>noble<s%> <S%G5347>Festus;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> I speak <S%G669>forth<s%> the <S%G4487>words<s%> of <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4997>soberness.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G1987>knoweth<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> these <S%G5130>things,<s%> <S%G4314>before<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> I <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G3955>freely:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I am <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> that <S%G3756>none<s%> <S%G5100><s%> of these <S%G5130>things<s%> are <S%G2990>hidden<s%> from <S%G846>him;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> this <S%G5124>thing<s%> <S%G2076>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4238>done<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G1137>corner.<s%>
King <S%G935><s%> <S%G67>Agrippa,<s%> <S%G4100>believest<s%> thou <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophets?<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> thou <S%G4100>believest.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G67>Agrippa<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G1722>Almost<s%> <S%G3641><s%> thou <S%G3982>persuadest<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> to <S%G1096>be<s%> a <S%G5546>Christian.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> I <S%G2172>would<s%> <S%G302><s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> that <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G4571>thou,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%> this <S%G4594>day,<s%> <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G1722>almost,<s%> <S%G3641><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>altogether<s%> <S%G4183><s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G3697>as<s%> <S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G1510>am,<s%> <S%G3924>except<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G1199>bonds.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> had <S%G5023>thus<s%> <S%G2036>spoken,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> rose <S%G450>up,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2232>governor,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G959>Bernice,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they that sat <S%G4775>with<s%> them: <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when they were gone <S%G402>aside,<s%> they <S%G2980>talked<s%> between <S%G4314>themselves,<s%> <S%G240><s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4238>doeth<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G1199>bonds.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa<s%> unto <S%G5347>Festus,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1410>might<s%> have been set at <S%G630>liberty,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> he had <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1941>appealed<s%> unto <S%G2541>Caesar.<s%>
